text: The Getaway is the eleventh studio album released by Red Hot Chili Peppers. Red Hot Chili Peppers is an American rock band. The album was released on June 17, 2016. It was produced by Danger Mouse. This is a different person than the band's normal producer, Rick Rubin. The album is the last Red Hot Chili Peppers album with guitar player Josh Klinghoffer. This is because John Frusciante came back to the band to play the guitar. == Track listing == == References == Category:2016 albums Category:Red Hot Chili Peppers albums Category:Rock albums
title: The Getaway
